sample build file

That's the build file that was opened at this time. 

An interesting point is that this does not seem to be reproducible. I found
this exception only once because I was debugging the startup of another set of
plug-ins. I noticed that the editor showing the build script showed different
error annotations. In 90% of the cases it started without error annotations in
the other 10% it showed error annotations in different offsets (not
reproducible)

I also rember that the outline was showing only 2 targets. It showed all again 
on the next start.

Try as I might I cannot reproduce a problem here.
I will keep trying but Gunnar if you can provide any additional details to 
help determine the problem that would be great.

I have not been able to reproduce the problem but it would be good to look at 
this more later.
Nothing more planned for 3.0
